title: Controlling Your Attention to Apps
itunes:title: Controlling Your Attention to Apps
description:
Author and investor Nir Eyal of NirandFar.com discusses the pros and cons of habit-forming products.
Hosts: Carol Massar and Mike Regan. Producer: Paul Brennan. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
